body_html: It looks like clang-cl cannot play happily with pybind11 and is causing random crashes. So is there a method to specify generators for certain source files? We just compile the code under TH and THNN using clang-cl and keep the others going through MSVC. In that way, we don't need to modify ONNX and any other libraries that don't play well with clang-cl. What do you think? @yf225
